full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/18/2023 Escrow No. 2803DN TO: SERV E ESCROW COMPANY 3431 W. 8th St., Los Angeles, Ca. 90005 David Noh, Escrow Officer 388-9405 This instruction is given this 31st day of August , 19 76 by and between the SELLER/S (hereinafter called seller) NIKKOKU AMERICA, INC., 622-6532 114 South Main Street 484-2192 Los Angeles, Calif. 90012 By Taro Kamamori, Vice-Pres. & Secy. and the BUYER/S (hereinafter called buyer) HIRANAND T. GULRAJANI, SS: #557-08-2124 384-9827 PUSHPA H. GULRAJANI, SS# FOIA (b)(6) 816 South Westlake Ave. Los Angeles, Calif. 90057 name/s address/es phone/s The subject of this escrow, which seller owns and agrees to sell and buyer agrees to purchase from seller, are all assets of a business known as and located at TARO'S RESTAURANT 114 So. Main Street, Los Angeles, Ca. 90012 consisting of (check if applicable) [ x furniture, fixtures and equipment, [ x tradename, [x goodwill, x. ] lease, [x] leasehold improvements, [X], [ (or) on the following terms and conditions: 1. The purchase price of said assets shall be the sum of total $ 32,000.00 plus inventory of stock estimated at $1,400.00 being estimated/ of$ 33,400.00 of which buyer shall hand you upon execution hereof $ 2,000.00 and on or before September 10, 1976 the sum of $ 18,000.00 and the balance in the sum of approximately $ 13,400.00 evidenced by: a promissory note, executed by the buyer in favor of the seller, secured by a Security Agreement covering all of the secureable assets of the business, bearing interest on the unpaid principal from date of buyers poss- ession at the rate of ten (10%) per annum, principal and interest payable in 24 equal amoritized monthly installments when exact amount of note is determined, beginning 30 days after buyer possession and continuing on the same day of each month thereafter until paid in full. In the event buyer decide to deposit in escrow on or before September 10, 1976 in form of cashiers check in sum of$ 27,000.00 to be applied for buyers purchase price money in lieu of $18,000.00 as stated above, the purchase price of said assets will be reduced to $29,000.00 and the balance of the purchase price money in sum of $2,000.00 plus estimated inventory in sum of $1,400.00 in approximate total of $3,400.00 to be compen- sated to the seller in form of a promissory note, executed by the buyer in favor of the seller, secured by a Security Agreement covering all of the securable assets of the business, bearing interest on the unpaid principal from date of buyers possession at the rate of ten (10%) percent per annum, principal and interest payable in 12 equal amortizied monthly installments when the exact amount of note is determined, beginning 30 days after buyers possession and continuing on the same day of each month thereafter until paid in, 2. PRORATE as of possession: Personal property taxes if payment evidenced in escrow ( X ); Current rent @ full 1,000.00 due the 1st day of each month ( X ); Insurance at buyers option, per policy/ies or resume deposited in escrow ( X ). 3. Credit Seller and debit Buyer for the following: (a) Sales tax on fixtures based on a valuation of $ 4,000.00 or as may be required by the State Board of Equalization; (b) Lease security deposit of $ 1,000.00 or that amount acknowledged in lease documents handed you; 4. Usual costs of escrow (including inventory costs if billed through escrow) shall be paid 50 % by buyer and 50 % by seller. 5. Escrow shall close upon earliest legal published closing date and buyer shall deposit in escrow on or before close thereof the balance, or estimated balance, of all monies due to effect the same. 6. Inventory of stock in trade, if any, shall be taken at time of possession by and between the parties based on sellers cost prices, all saleable mdses & useable supplies buyer to pay the amount thereof per above terms of escrow. 7. Possession shall be granted to and taken by buyer as of the specific date agreed by the parties. 8. The parties agree to do all things necessary to close the escrow on the date set forth or on completion of the condi- tions so stated in item 5 hereof, and if requested by the escrow holder shall arrange to meet in escrow for said purpose.
